thread.title_full: World's most popular cruise ships - 2015 | International | Travel | Toronto Sun

author: Postmedia Network
title: World's most popular cruise ships - 2015 | International | Travel | Toronto Sun
text:
Whether you're planning a summer cruise or just looking to book your winter cruise getaway now, make sure you're sailing on the very best cruise ships.
New data from CruiseCompete.com , the online cruise marketplace and booking site, has revealed the most popular cruise ships at both the contemporary and premium levels.
Rankings are based on the reviews of thousands of cruisers, based on amenities, service and dining.
Have you been on a cruise before?
